name: MEC Draco Jr.-5 Down Sleeping Bag - Youths
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Let the little explorers enjoy the luxurious comfort of their own down bag. The Draco line delivers all the benefits of a technical down bag at a price you'd expect to pay for synthetic. Tightly woven shell fabric, baffles in the torso region and drawcords contain warmth. Tapered cut allows a little bit of movement while they sleep off the night’s s'more feast.Pertex® Quantum ripstop nylon shell has a DWR treatment to shed moisture and a tight weave to retain down.30-denier woven nylon lining.Insulated with 650 fill power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.Vertical baffles over the torso prevent cold spots.Rear Pad Lock secures the sleeping bag to the sleeping mat.Medium-width cutHood and shoulder drawcords have different profiles, so you can tell them apart in the dark. Small size’s hood is externally adjustable with a hook-and-loops strap, making it easy to snug-up when you are tucking in the littlest campers.Draft tube keeps heat in and cold out.Drawcord stuff sack and large storage sack included.EN standard tested, for dependable temperature ratings.

        Sustainability

Additional feature(s): Zips to other MEC sleeping bags
